azureml 0.1.0

Reference

All functions

attach_aks_compute()

Attach an already existing AKS compute resource with the provided workspace

azureml

azureml module User can access functions/modules in azureml that are not exposed through the exported R functions.

bandit_policy()

Create Bandit policy for HyperDrive runs

bayesian_parameter_sampling()

Define Bayesian Parameter sampling over hyperparameter search space

cancel_run()

Cancel run

choice()

Specify a discrete set of options to sample from

container_registry()

Get Azure Container Registry.

create_aks_compute()

Create AksCompute

create_aml_compute()

Create AmlCompute

create_conda_env()

Create conda environment

create_launch_script()

Creates a R launch script which contains all the packages to be installed before running entry_script

create_workspace()

Create a new Azure Machine Learning Workspace

delete_compute()

Delete compute

delete_model()

Delete this model from its associated workspace.

delete_workspace()

Delete workspace

deploy_model()

Deploy a Webservice from zero or more model objects.

deserialize_to_model()

Convert a json object into a Model object.

detach_aks_compute()

Detach the AksCompute object from its associated workspace

download_from_datastore()

Download the data from the datastore to the local file system

download_model()

Download model to target_dir of local file system.

environment()

Configure the python environment where the experiment is executed.

estimator()

Create Estimator

experiment()

Create an Azure Machine Learning Experiment

generate_docker_file()

Generate a dockerfile string to build the image for training.

get_aks_compute_credentials()

Retrieve the credentials for the AKS target

get_best_run_by_primary_metric()

Return the best performing run amongst all completed runs

get_child_runs_sorted_by_primary_metric()

Return the child runs sorted in descending order by best primary metric

get_child_run_hyperparameters()

Return hyperparameters for all child runs

get_child_run_metrics()

Return metrics from all child runs

get_compute()

Get compute. Returns NULL if compute is not found on workspace.

get_current_run()

Gets the context object for a run

get_default_datastore()

Get default datastore associated with a workspace

get_environment()

Return the environment object.

get_model()

Retrieve the Model object from the cloud.

get_run_metrics()

Get the metrics for run

get_workspace()

Get an existing workspace

grid_parameter_sampling()

Define Grid Parameter sampling over hyperparameter search space

hyperdrive_config()

Create configuration for a HyperDrive run

install_azureml()

Install azureml

list_workspaces()

List all workspaces that the user has access to in the specified subscription_id parameter.The list of workspaces can be filtered based on the resource group.

load_workspace_from_config()

Load workspace from config

lognormal()

Specify a normal distribution of the form exp(normal(mu, sigma))

loguniform()

Specify a log uniform distribution

log_metric_to_run()

Log metric to run

median_stopping_policy()

Create Median Stopping policy for HyperDrive runs

normal()

Specify a real value that is normally-distributed with mean mu and standard deviation sigma

package_model()

Create a model package in the form of a Docker image or Dockerfile build context

primary_metric_goal()

Define supported metric goals for hyperparameter tuning

qlognormal()

Specify a normal distribution of the form round(exp(normal(mu, sigma)) / q) * q

qloguniform()

Specify a uniform distribution of the form round(exp(uniform(min_value, max_value) / q) * q

qnormal()

Specify a normal distribution of the form round(normal(mu, sigma) / q) * q

quniform()

Specify a uniform distribution of the form round(uniform(min_value, max_value) / q) * q

randint()

Specify a set of random integers in the range [0, upper)

random_parameter_sampling()

Define Random Parameter sampling over hyperparameter search space

register_environment()

Register the environment object in your workspace.

register_model()

Register a model with the provided workspace.

serialize_model()

Convert this Model into a json serialized dictionary

submit_experiment()

Submit experiment

truncation_selection_policy()

Create Truncation Selection policy for HyperDrive runs

uniform()

Specify a uniform distribution from which samples are taken

upload_files_to_datastore()

Upload the data from the local file system to the Azure storage this datastore points to.

upload_to_datastore()

Upload the data from the local file system to the Azure storage this datastore points to.

wait_for_compute()

Wait for cluster's instantiation

wait_for_run_completion()

Wait for the completion of this run

write_workspace_config()

Write out the Workspace ARM properties to a config file
